outputs.output_descr: The Annual Workplan on "Promoting Inclusive Growth and Development"   supports Ghana's vision of inclusive growth and development, as encapsulated in the Ghana Shared Growth and Development Agenda (GSGDA) 2010-2013, particularly the GSGDA priority areas of "effective decentralisation for enhanced local economic development and efficiency in public service delivery at all levels".  The AWP has been developed with key national institutions and civil society organizations to promote national ownership and sustainability of interventions.    The AWP focuses on interventions that will bring about transformational change, bridge inequalities and enhance human development. Where appropriate, the programme will draw on relevant and strategic downstream demonstration interventions with potential for replication, scaling up, and sustainability.
